data.name: Space Architect
data.detailed_description:
Humanity reached stars using megacorporation funds to fuel exploration & expansion. You're one of the station architects who's trying to pay off debt taken from one of such corporations.

Good management of resources is your golden ticket to freedom & richness. It's deep space after all.

Units
The building block of your base, they work, eat, die. They are expensive to get and got easily overworked, so automatize your station as soon as you can!

Trade
As soon as you'll have your docking port set up - you will start to get visitors to trade with - earn cash, supply yourself with rare items and gain tech points.

Production
Change one resource into another, more complex one, with the help of devices at your station. Base resources are obtained by mining asteroids.

Quests
Mainly to get you to know game mechanics.

Tech
You know nothing but basics. Gain tech points through trading and unlock advanced technologies to produce rare items and do it faster.

data.short_description: Space station building game. Survive, expand, prosper, and become a major hub!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Potato
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Propably
  • Additional Notes: Ran on some old laptop
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4570 3,20GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Ran on developer PC
